pageTitle: Helpers—Painters, Paperhangers, Plasterers, and Stucco Masons
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {22381=May 2006 Metropolitan and Nonmetropolitan Area Occupational Employment and Wage Estimates, 22836=Download May 2006 Occupational Employment and Wage Estimates in Zipped Excel files, 22145=May 2006 National Occupational Employment and Wage Estimates, 24261=U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics | Division of Occupational Employment Statistics, PSB Suite 2135, 2 Massachusetts Avenue, NE Washington, DC 20212-0001, 23038=Last Modified Date: December 6, 2007, 20446=About May 2006 National, State, Metropolitan, and nonmetropolitan Area Occupational Employment and Wage Estimates, 22273=May 2006 State Occupational Employment and Wage Estimates, 22521=May 2006 National Industry-Specific Occupational Employment and Wage Estimates, 794=Help painters, paperhangers, plasterers, or stucco masons by performing duties of lesser skill. Duties include using, supplying or holding materials or tools, and cleaning work area and equipment. Exclude apprentice workers and report them with the appropriate skilled construction trade occupation (47-2011 through 47-2221). Exclude construction laborers who do not primarily assist painters, paperhangers, plasterers, or stucco masons, and classify them under "Construction Laborers" (47-2061).}
textBeforeTable: Employment estimate and mean wage estimates for this occupation: National estimates for this occupation: Top National estimates for this occupation Industry profile for this occupation State profile for this occupation Metropolitan area profile for this occupation Occupational Employment and Wages, May 2006 47-3014 Helpers—Painters, Paperhangers, Plasterers, and Stucco Masons Help painters, paperhangers, plasterers, or stucco masons by performing duties of lesser skill. Duties include using, supplying or holding materials or tools, and cleaning work area and equipment. Exclude apprentice workers and report them with the appropriate skilled construction trade occupation (47-2011 through 47-2221). Exclude construction laborers who do not primarily assist painters, paperhangers, plasterers, or stucco masons, and classify them under "Construction Laborers" (47-2061). Occupational Employment Statistics U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics
